import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Check, X, Star, Users, Award, Zap, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; import { pricingPlans } from '../data/mockData'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const PricingPage = () => { const [billingCycle, setBillingCycle] = useState('month'); const [selectedPlan, setSelectedPlan] = useState(null); const handleSelectPlan = (planId) => { setSelectedPlan(planId); toast.success(`${pricingPlans.find(p => p.id === planId)?.name} plan selected!`); }; const getPlanPrice = (plan) => { if (plan.price === 0) return 'Free'; const price = billingCycle === 'year' ? plan.price * 10 : plan.price; // 2 months free for yearly return `$${price}/${billingCycle === 'year' ? 'year' : 'month'}`; }; const getYearlySavings = (plan) => { if (plan.price === 0) return null; const monthlyPrice = plan.price; const yearlyPrice = monthlyPrice * 10; // 2 months free const savings = (monthlyPrice * 12) - yearlyPrice; return `Save $${savings}/year`; }; return (

{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I change my plan anytime?

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

Is there a setup fee?

No, there are no setup fees. You only pay for the plan you choose.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

Can I cancel my subscription?

Yes, you can cancel anytime. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Teaching?

Join thousands of teachers who are already earning more with MentorConnect

); }; export default PricingPage;
